highlights: Top performer for creating applications and educational content to promote NPI
Lead analytics initiative to generate measures of effectiveness among the team's generated collateral.
Developed marketing launch plans for upcoming products
Protoype engineer for numerous projects including a human-sized, engineering plastic FDM 3D printer and a custom AI-driven remote security system
Communicated with clients throughout the iterative design process to establish clear expectations and optimal product outcomes
Researched optimal techniques for using machine learning on satellite imagery to detect/classify objects
Synthesized data and worked with specialists to internally publish my paper "Machine Learning in Radio Frequency Communications"
Used machine learning to identify promoter sequences in DNA and co-published an infographic on the topic.

projects.name: The Cold Plate Reference Design
projects.description: Showcases the Core Independent Peripherals on the PIC16F17146 MCU. This demo provides a reference design for common tasks 8-bit MCUs are used for, allowing customers to copy aspects of this project in their own designs. It has become Microchip's most viewed repository.

projects.name: AI-driven security system
projects.description: A low-power security system for providing real-time identification and alerts of humans, vehicles, and various animals across a multi-acre ranch

projects.name: 3D PEEK Printer
projects.description: Human-sized (1'x1'x5') 3D printer capable of printing engineering grade plastics, such as PEEK, for biofuel refinement
